attributes.action: make it the law that every drinking establishment has a street steward to control the noise and behaviour of crowds entering, leaving or standing outside (for a cigarette) of said premises
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Recently, as reported in the news, there have been several people stabbed outside drinking establishments. It would be beneficial if stewarding carried out into the street instead of ending at the door.
